name: Commonwealth ex rel. Choice, Appellant, v. Brierley
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Choice v. Brierley

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

Mr. Chief Justice Jones, Mr. Justice Eagen, Mr. Justice Pomeroy and Mr. Justice Manderino adhere to the views that they expressed in Com. ex rel. Rambeau v. Board of Probation and Parole, 455 Pa. 8, 314 A. 2d 842 (1973).
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Choice, Appellant, v. Brierley.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree reversed and case remanded to the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole for a counselled hearing on the revocation of parole. See Com. ex rel. Rambeau v. Board of Probation and Parole, 4 Pa. Commonwealth Ct. 152 (1972).
Mr. Chief Justice Jones, Mr. Justice Eagen, Mr. Justice Pomeroy and Mr. Justice Manderino adhere to the views that they expressed in Com. ex rel. Rambeau v. Board of Probation and Parole, 455 Pa. 8, 314 A. 2d 842 (1973).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John A. Miller, with him Buchanan, Ingersoll, Bodewald, Kyle and Buerger, for appellant.
Leonard Paclcel, Deputy Attorney General, with him Curtis M. Ponts, Deputy Attorney General, and J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Choice, Appellant, v. Brierley.
Argued September 29, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
John A. Miller, with him Buchanan, Ingersoll, Bodewald, Kyle and Buerger, for appellant.
Leonard Paclcel, Deputy Attorney General, with him Curtis M. Ponts, Deputy Attorney General, and J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for appellees.
March 20, 1973:
